title: 100 graded t206's for sale--many with semi-tough backs

posts.post_title: 100 graded t206's for sale--many with semi-tough backs
posts.post_content:
A few months ago I had about the same number of mostly PSA ( a few SGC) graded T206's;  about half have since been sold and about 40-50 new ones have been added,  many of these with some of the somewhat tougher backs--Sovereigns,  Tolstoi,  EPDG,  Polar Bear, Old Mill and Cycle

   If you would like this updated spreadsheet emailed to you, please contact me at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]  or cell is 770 873 1181

Scans are available upon request beginning later today

Prices include shipping and insurance

Prefer cks at this time if possible as opposed to paypal please

thanks in advance
Bill Latzko
6348 Views Trace
Norcross Ga 30092
